attributes.action: Revise the new tax band that hits the very poor.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap the new tax band which hits those without children who are on low incomes. For example, I am £52 a months worse off due to the new banding system. I cannot afford to lose this much. I cannot afford to live anymore.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
